info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued March 18 at 6:16PM CDT until March 18 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Midland/Odessa TX
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Southern Lea County in southeastern New Mexico... Western Ector County in western Texas... Western Andrews County in western Texas... Ward County in western Texas... Winkler County in western Texas... Northeastern Culberson County in southwestern Texas... Loving County in western Texas...
* Until 745 PM CDT/645 PM MDT/.
* At 615 PM CDT/515 PM MDT/, a dust channel was 14 miles west of Wink, moving northeast at 55 mph.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph.
SOURCE...Public reports of less than a quarter mile visibility near Mentone.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 49 and 88, and between mile markers 91 and 95.
Locations impacted include... Kermit, Barstow, Wink, Thorntonville, Slash Ranch, Roy Hurd Memorial Airport, Eunice Airport, Monahans Sandhills State Park, Eunice, Jal Airport, Notrees, Jal, Bennett, Halfway, Frankel City, Mentone, Pyote, Monahans, Oil Center, and Wickett.
info.instruction:
Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
There is no safe place on a highway when a dust storm hits. Visibility can be lost immediately, making it difficult or impossible to slow down and avoid stopped vehicles. Delay travel, or safely exit the highway before the dust storm arrives.

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 7:45 PM CDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 7:45 PM CDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

area.areaDesc: Lea, NM; Andrews, TX; Culberson, TX; Ector, TX; Loving, TX; Ward, TX; Winkler, TX

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 7:45 PM CDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 7:45 PM CDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.
